conversation.text: Hey Grandpa. It's been a while.
Sure has. I take it you've killed my children?
Yup. It's been a productive morning.
I'll say. I guess all that's left now is to kill me, huh?
Good thing I'm just a fragile old man? Should be easy.
It's not like I'm going to transform into a monstrous pile of living flesh or anything.
I'll miss that trademark humor of yours, grandpa.
